Overall.label: Frontline aggregated template (all institutions)
Overall.notes: Frontline FETP total programme costs across all contributing institutions. Amounts are totals and are used to derive cost shares by component and the ratio of indirect and opportunity costs to direct programme costs.

components.description: Salaries and benefits for local staff (faculty and secretariat) dedicated to the frontline programme, including trainers, convenors, mentors and administrators.
Purchase costs for desktop computers, laptops, projectors, printers and similar items used by frontline staff and faculty.
Software required for data analysis, training delivery and general office use by frontline staff and faculty.
Lease of office space and utilities such as electricity, water and internet used by frontline FETP staff and faculty.
Printing of training materials, manuals and other educational resources for frontline cohorts.
Costs associated with organising frontline training sessions, including venue hire and catering.
Travel for frontline faculty, mentors and trainees within the country for training, outbreaks, meetings and conferences, including per diem, lodging and transport.
International travel for frontline faculty, mentors and trainees for conferences, outbreaks and meetings (not reported in the aggregated template).
Other direct frontline costs not classified elsewhere in the template.

components.subCategory: Indirect including opportunity cost of trainee time
components.description: Total indirect frontline programme costs, including the value of trainee time while in training and other overheads that are not directly attributable to specific activities. Treated as opportunity cost when the economic cost toggle is activated.

Overall.label: Intermediate aggregated template (all institutions)

components.description: Salaries and benefits for local staff dedicated to the intermediate programme.
Salary and benefits for consultants, advisors and similar staff supporting the intermediate programme.
Office equipment for intermediate staff and faculty.
Software for intermediate programme staff and faculty.
Rent and utilities for office space used by intermediate programme staff.
Trainee stipends, scholarships and other allowances for intermediate trainees.
Laptops, internet access and similar equipment provided to intermediate trainees.
Software licences provided directly to intermediate trainees.
Training materials and printing for intermediate cohorts.
Workshops and seminars for intermediate cohorts.
In country travel for intermediate faculty, mentors and trainees.
International travel related to intermediate training and meetings.
Other direct costs for the intermediate programme.

components.subCategory: Indirect including opportunity cost of trainee time
components.description: Total indirect intermediate programme costs, including the value of trainee time while in training and other overheads that are not directly attributable to specific activities. Treated as opportunity cost when the economic cost toggle is activated.

components.description: Salaries and benefits for staff dedicated to the advanced programme across all institutions.

Office equipment for advanced programme staff and faculty.

Rent and utilities for advanced programme staff.
Trainee stipends, scholarships and other allowances for advanced trainees.
Laptops, internet access and similar equipment provided to advanced trainees.
Software licences provided directly to advanced trainees.
Training materials for advanced cohorts.
Workshops and seminars in the advanced programme.
In country travel for advanced programme activities.
International travel for advanced programme activities.
Other direct costs associated with the advanced FETP.
